channel.title: Phone Hacking Movies on Writing by Harper Reed
channel.description: Recent content in Phone Hacking Movies on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: getting stabbed in the stomach with a knife would really really hurt
item.description: So I am watching 15 minutes. boy.. it isn’t great. and robert de niro just died.. wtf. I hate that. when movies deriviate from the formula. it isn’t right. there should be a law.anyway. I am sitting here watching this movie.. writing on my weblog.. chillin.. chekcin email.. now if all this were built into my phone I would be happy. real real happy. so happy I think I would probably go out more.
